page.title: 11Motorway access to the area.
page.content: We carried out a traffic census of all vehicles leaving the M6 motorway at junction 27, and distinguished between traffic travelling to the junction from North or South, between private and commercial vehicles, and between those going West, (probable destination Parbold, Appley Bridge or Croston) and East (probable destination Standish or Shevington) In all 243 vehicles were counted in the 30 minutes(1.45 to 2.15 pm) on a Wednesday. Our findings were that twice as many vehicles entered the area from the South as from the North. There were twice as many private as commercial vehicles. Private vehicles travelling East exceeded those travelling West by 2:1. Of the commercial vehicles there were slightly more leaving to the West than to the East.
